title: Property register card, and city survey plan for plot in original signed by the Competent City Surve
clause_text: Property register card, and city survey plan for plot in original signed by the Competent City Survey Authority not issued prior to12 months, Architect's certificate for plot area along with area calculations by triangulation method. Please approve the proposed development/construction and permit me to execute the work. Date: ……………………. Signature of Owner --------------------------
